item.title: Future Wonders: the future is already here
item.description:
What Matters in 2026

January 1st is a strange day to talk about technology. The calendar resets, but the world doesn’t.
And yet, every year, there’s a moment when you can almost feel the shift: tools become habits, ideas become workflows, “experimental” becomes normal.

Future Wonders is our attempt to capture and understand where we are heading.

Not predictions for a distant tomorrow. Not product launches as trophies.
Just the quiet, fascinating edge of what’s already happening—and what it takes to understand it with enough technical honesty to be useful.
